name: Disarm Protocol
description:
Entry for Ludum Dare 52

Disarm Protocol is a survival reverse-crafting tycoon.

You are Disarmer 52, a lifeform whose responsibility is to purge and disarm every radioactive rubber duck present in the town.

It's a far, far future and resources such as plastic, rubber, metal and plutonium can only be harvested from the weaponry dropped from ducks.

- Use right-click to move and interact (attack) enemies and interact with piles.

- Use left-click to interact with machines and build machine.

- You may also drag items from your inventory to your hotbar to use them.

- I to open inventory

The game is unfortunately unfinished but you may want to play it just to experience it how it is. CONSIDER PLAYING THE UPDATED VERSION (If any available) if you saw potential on the OG one, we'll be updating it for a while.

We'll appreciate any feedback :)

We may update the link with new versions, but we'll maintain the original buggy one because, well, it's the O.G and the one that is actually taking part on LD.

Options are not working correctly as well, sorry!
